pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: Name of the Resource group within the Azure subscription.

pathParameters.name: profileName
pathParameters.description: Name of the CDN profile which is unique within the resource group.

pathParameters.name: endpointName
pathParameters.description: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.

queryParameters.name: api-version
queryParameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2017-04-02.
